contentrichtext.text: [[Image:Flag_of_National_Olympiad_in_Informatics.gif|right|150px|thumbnail|Flag of National Olympiad in Informatics]] '''The National Olympiad in Informatics''' (NOI) is an annual [[Informatics (academic field)|informatics]] [[competition]] for secondary school students. The first NOI was held in 1984, earlier than [[International_Olympiad_in_Informatics|IOI]]. == Overview == The contest consists of one practice contest and two official competitions, each involving solving problems of an [[Algorithm|algorithmic]] nature. Each day's competition consists of three problems and contestants have five hours to try to solve them. Students compete on an individual basis, with up to five students competing from each participating [[Province of China|province]] (with around 30 provinces in 2003). Students are selected from similar contests in their own province. [[Image:20020811203148_-_NOI_2002.jpg|right|240px|thumbnail|Computer used in NOI 2002]] == List of NOI Locations == * '''NOI 2014''' will be held in [[Shenzhen]], [[Guangdong]] July, 2014<ref>{{cite web|title=List of NOI time and locations|url=http://www.noi.cn/2013-04-17-10-08-53/2013-04-17-10-15-59/527-noi}}</ref> * '''NOI 2013''' will be held in [[Chengdu]], [[Sichuan]] July 14- July 20, 2013<ref>{{cite web|title=Time of NOI2013 confirmed|url=http://www.noi.cn/noi-news/noi/537-noi2013714-20|accessdate=6 June 2013}}</ref> * '''NOI 2012''' was held in [[Changzhou]], [[Jiangsu]] July 28 - August 3, 2012 * '''NOI 2011''' was held in [[Changchun]], [[Jilin]] August 6 - August 12, 2011 * '''NOI 2010''' was held in [[Yantai]], [[Shandong]] July 31 - August 6, 2010 * '''NOI 2009''' was held in [[Beijing]], July 25 - July 31, 2009 * '''NOI 2008''' was held in [[Shaoxing]], [[Zhejiang]] July 27 - August 2, 2008 * '''NOI 2007''' was held in [[Fuzhou]], [[Fujian]] July 28 - August 3, 2007 * '''NOI 2006''' was held in [[Mianyang]], [[Sichuan]], July 22 - 28, 2006 * '''NOI 2005''' was held in [[Zhengzhou]], [[Henan]] August 5 - 11, 2005 * '''NOI 2004''' was held in [[Changsha]], [[Hunan]] August 8 - 14, 2004 * '''NOI 2003''' was held in [[Shanghai]], August 3 - 9, 2003 * '''NOI 2002''' was held in [[Tianjin]], August 10 - 16, 2002 * '''NOI 2001''' was held in [[Xi'an]], [[Shaanxi]] in September, 2001 * '''NOI 2000''' was held in [[Macau]] in March, 2000 * '''NOI 1999''' was held in [[Beijing]] in July, 1999 * '''NOI 1998''' was held in [[Hangzhou]], [[Zhejiang]] in August, 1998 * '''NOI 1997''' was held in [[Hong Kong]] in August, 1997 * '''NOI 1996''' was held in [[Shanghai]] in August, 1996 * '''NOI 1995''' was held in [[Nanjing]], [[Jiangsu]] in August, 1995 * '''NOI 1994''' was held in [[Beijing]] in August, 1994 * '''NOI 1993''' was held in [[Taiyuan]], [[Shanxi]] in August, 1993 * '''NOI 1992''' was held in [[Beijing]] in August, 1992 * '''NOI 1991''' was held in [[Xiamen]], [[Fujian]] in August, 1991 * '''NOI 1990''' was held in [[Beijing]] in August, 1990 * '''NOI 1989''' was held in [[Huizhou]], [[Guangdong]] in December, 1989 * '''NOI 1988''' was held in [[Beijing]] in August, 1988 * '''NOI 1987''' was held in [[Weifang]] and [[Qingdao]], [[Shandong]] in August, 1987 * '''NOI 1986''' was held in [[Beijing]] in August, 1986 * '''NOI 1985''' was held in [[Tianjin]] in August, 1985 * '''NOI 1984''' was held in [[Beijing]] in August, 1984 == See also == * [[ACM International Collegiate Programming Contest]] * [[International Olympiad in Informatics]] * [[Olympiad in Informatics Beginners' Home]] ==References== {{Reflist}} == External links == * [http://www.noi.cn China National Olympiad in Informatics] (Chinese) * [http://www.oibh.org/ Olympiad in Informatics Beginners' Home] (Chinese) [[Category:Programming contests]] [[Category:Competitions in China]]
